00072     {
00073         static fast_mutex _S_mtx;

00075     public:
00076         // The C++ 1998 Standard required the use of `friend' here, but
00077         // this requirement was considered a defect and subsequently

00084         class lock

00086             lock(const lock&);

00088         public:

00091                 if (_RealLock)

00093             }
00094             ~lock()
00095             {
00096                 if (_RealLock)
00097                     _S_mtx.unlock();
00098             }
00099         };
00100 
00101         typedef volatile _Host volatile_type;
